rug_gilded_blue_recipe.description: Skillfully woven from dyed and golden threads

rug_gilded_coral_recipe.flavor: Earth from a long-dried seabed to the south is baked and ground to produce this lively red-orange

rug_gilded_sage_recipe.flavor: Achieving a delicate green requires skill; this stain made from a pulp of potent herbs will rapidly turn anything sour
